alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:50PM EDT until June 17 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in central South Carolina... Northern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Richland County in central South Carolina... South central Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oakland, or near Shaw Air Base, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Bishopville, Shaw Air Base, Lee State Park, Oakland, Sumter County Airport, Elliott, Mulberry, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Ashwood, Oswego, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Manville, Spring Hill, Boykin, St. Charles, Cherryvale and Wateree River Correctional Institution. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 111 and 124. Interstate 95 between mile markers 142 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
